VideoTitle: Windows Azure for IT Professionals: (02) Infrastructure Services Foundation

VideoTitle: Windows Azure for IT Professionals: (06) Migrating Virtual Machines and Web Applications to Windows Azure
Author: JeffKoch
Description: Migrating from on premise to cloud can be a challenge. In this chapter learn how to migrate virtual machines and disks, and the best approach to migration. [00:57] - Migrating VMs and disks [14:54] -
